channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Carriageway potholes, 16th November
item.description:
There are a number of potholes on the Bath Road near the junction with Montpellier Drive. The carriageway seems to be deteriorating.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 118 Bath Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Telephone cable - rubbish, 16th November
item.description:
Rubbish entangled in overhead cables.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 New Barn Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on exit to roundabout, 16th November
item.description:
Small deep pothole on what looks like an access cover. I am concerned that it might cause a cyclist or motorcyclist to swerve suddenly at the roundabout exit to avoid it. It has been there for many months but I have only just remembered to report it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 44 Sandford Mill Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Lights not working Voxwell Lane, 15th November
item.description:
Voxwell Lane Street lights 12, 13 and 14 (between Furlong Lane and Snowshill Drive) have not been working for several days.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Charlecote Corner, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Brooklyn Road at the junction of Tennyson surface has gone big pothole opened up in the last day or so, 15th November
item.description:
Brooklyn Road at the junction of Tennyson surface has gone big pothole opened up in the last day or so. Estimate 6 to 7 cm deep deeper by tomorrow because it is in the run of the traffic

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mud on Road, 15th November
item.description:
Due to the ongoing building work on a near by building site, the road is covered in mud either side of the site access. I have reported this as a planning breach to the planning authority but is there anything that the highways team can do Road has been increasing slippy recently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Haydon Old Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement unsafe, 15th November
item.description:
Section of footpath outside 26 Cheltenham Road in need of reinstating, vehicles partially parked on footpath necessitate having to walk on the uneven surface, which is a trip hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Greystones Cottages Gloucester Street, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Island post, 14th November
item.description:
6539 island lighting post flashing and not permanently on. Has been like this for weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Longlevens

Pothole providing significant hazard to road users.

item.title: Deep pothole, North bound M5 jct 11, 12th November
item.description:
Deep pothole on slow lane North bound M5 between Jct 11a and 11. Roughly 100m prior to the 1 mile warning of turnoff sign to Jct 11
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Churchdown

Double mattress in Grosvenor Terrace Just off the Strand

item.title: Streetlights not working on Millfields, Hucclecote, 11th November
item.description:
Several street lights as you come around the bend and into the straight part of Millfields not been working for a number of days now. Making it very dark.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Millfields, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole in A40, 10th November
item.description:
Large and deep hole in westbound carriageway of A40 Gloucester Road near junction with Tennyson Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Kingsley Gardens, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excess mud on road from nearby groundworks, 10th November
item.description:
There is excess mud on the A436 between the turning for the Star golf course and Seven Springs which seem to have originated from the groundworks being carried out at the eastern edge of the golf course. Surely there should be a traffic management plan in order to keep the road surface clear of mud and debris ? It looks like a large vehicle has left the road recently on this stretch of road and should be addressed asap so as to not cause another accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Coberley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic Lights have been out of order for several days, 10th November
item.description:
The temporary traffic lights have been out of order all week. It is very dangerous to cross here. This morning there were five cyclists queued up waiting to cross this very busy road. Eventually one cyclist had to cycle into the flow of traffic to force it to slow down. Please sort these out before there is a fatality.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Bath Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Payment covered with sand and dirt after city fibre works, 10th November
item.description:
Payment covered with sand and dirt after city fibre works. Can someone else them to come and sweep up please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 62/66 Edinburgh Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement outside Coronation Square shops including farm foods and Greggs covered with leaves and litter, 10th November
item.description:
Pavement outside Coronation Square shops including farm foods and Greggs covered with leaves and litter. Not sure whose job it is to tidy up the leaves but this is a high football area and really need something done

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 62/66 Edinburgh Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
